solution: I solved my issue adding on /app/build.gradle apply from: ../../node_modules/react-native-vector-icons/fonts.gradle and then I uninstall the app from my phone and reinstall again. -> reference on https://github.com/oblador/react-native-vector-icons/issues/661#issuecomment-378546936

description: Could not get BatchedBridge, make sure your bundle is packaged properly -> this error has been description here https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/9336

solution: sudo lsof -nP -iTCP:8081 -sTCP:LISTEN then run ps aux | grep <PID> to check services, at last, use command kill <PID>
